content:
From: Fabian Huch <huch@in.tum.de>
We have a system outage: two of our servers (for the build manager,
including the master node) did not come back up after a reboot for
kernel updates.

Somehow our workstations are much more reliable than the machines with
server hardware, even though they even have an RMI.

Fabian

From: Fabian Huch <huch@in.tum.de>
The system is back.

Fabian

On 1/17/25 10:12, Fabian Huch wrote:

We have a system outage: two of our servers (for the build manager,
including the master node) did not come back up after a reboot for
kernel updates.

Somehow our workstations are much more reliable than the machines with
server hardware, even though they even have an RMI.

Fabian
